channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kentucky Woman Sent Box Of Human Arms, Fingers Instead Of Medications
item.description: A Kentucky woman was expecting a delivery of medications and medical supplies. But when she opened the box, she found four human fingers and two human...

item.title: Why And How Modern Chip Design Is Automated
item.description: AI-driven semiconductor design eclipses human understanding, reshaping workflows into full-stack, automated, hardware-software “layer-cake” systems.

item.title: ‘The Witcher’ Season 4 Review: The Good, The Bad And The Rats
item.description: 'The Witcher' returns to Netflix with a new Geralt of Rivia in a mixed fourth season.

item.title: Everything Runs Inside AI Now. Including Your Business.

item.title: AI Is Learning To Fight Fires — But Can We Trust It With The Flames?
item.description: Can AI stop the next wildfire before it spreads? New technology aims to fight fires faster than humans ever could.

item.title: “I’ve got your back”

item.title: Living in ghost cities
